io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class NanoleafDeviceMeta

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.NanoleafDeviceMeta

  • public class NanoleafDeviceMeta
extends java.lang.Object
    An object for storing information related to a Nanoleaf device. This information is typically received from mDNS broadcast packets, however, this class can also be used separately as a simple storage for Nanoleaf devices.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NanoleafDeviceMeta(java.lang.String hostName, int port, java.lang.String deviceId, java.lang.String deviceName)
      Creates a new metadata object using existing Nanoleaf device information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NanoleafDeviceMeta

        public NanoleafDeviceMeta(java.lang.String hostName,
                          int port,
                          java.lang.String deviceId,
                          java.lang.String deviceName)
        Creates a new metadata object using existing Nanoleaf device information.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the hostname/ IP address of the device
        port - the port that the device is using
        deviceId - the unique device id for the device
        deviceName - the unique name for the device (a combination of the device type and the MAC address)

    • Method Detail

      • fromMDNSInstance

        public static NanoleafDeviceMeta fromMDNSInstance(Instance instance)

        Creates a new metadata object using packet data from an mDNS broadcast.

        Note: This is used internally by the API.

        Parameters:
        instance - the packet data containing the Nanoleaf device information
        Returns:
        a new metadata object

        Parameters:

      • getDeviceName

        public java.lang.String getDeviceName()
        Gets the device name of the associated Nanoleaf device. The device name is either a combination of the device type and the MAC address, or a combination of the device type and the model number. For example, "Nanoleaf Light Panels 11:ab:2c".
        Returns:
        the device name of the Nanoleaf device

      • setDeviceName

        public void setDeviceName(java.lang.String deviceName)

        Sets the device name of the associated Nanoleaf device. The device name is either a combination of the device type and the MAC address, or a combination of the device type and model number. For example, "Nanoleaf Light Panels 11:ab:2c".

        Note: This does not affect the device name of the actual Nanoleaf device.

        Parameters:
        deviceName - the device name of the device

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
